main.Query:
declare @vchSQL nvarchar(max) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[tblPoolFunctionToECMapping]'') AND type in (N''U'')) DROP TABLE [dbo].[tblPoolFunctionToECMapping]
SET ANSI_NULLS ON SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[tblPoolFunctionToECMapping]( [PoolFunctionName] [nvarchar](200) NOT NULL, [CriteriaSetId] [bigint] NOT NULL, [CriteriaName] [nvarchar](200) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_FunctionPoolToECMapping] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [PoolFunctionName] ASC, [CriteriaSetId] ASC, [CriteriaName] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]'
exec (@vchSQL)
